meanings.sent1: After a year of relaxation, he unretired to pursue his passion for painting.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes unretire to compete again after realizing they miss the thrill of the game.
meanings.sent3: The retired detective unretired to solve one last mystery before hanging up his hat for good.
meanings.sent4: Like a phoenix rising from the ashes, she unretired to show the world her true potential.
meanings.sent5: His decision to unretire and return to work surprised everyone, but he was eager to make a difference once again.

meanings.sent1: The unretired professor continued to teach at the university even after reaching retirement age.
meanings.sent2: She was unretired and still actively involved in various community projects.
meanings.sent3: The unretired firefighter was always ready to jump into action at a moment's notice.
meanings.sent4: Despite being unretired, he maintained a busy schedule with his volunteer work.
meanings.sent5: Her unretired status allowed her to enjoy the benefits of retirement while still contributing to society.
